001package interfaces;
002
003import java.awt.Graphics2D;
004
005/**
006 * Public Interface for Intersection objects.
007 * @author Borja Zarco
008 * @author Anita
009 */
010public interface IntersectionInterface {
011    
012    /**
013     * Get Intersection ID.
014     * @return ID of Intersection
015     */
016    public int getID();
017    
018    /**
019     * Add a connecting road to the intersection.
020     * @param road
021     */
022    public void addRoad(Road road);
023    
024    /**
025     * Checks if there is room in the intersection and road to be entered (roadEntering)
026     * If yes, returns the index of the lane that the vehicle will enter in roadEntering
027     * If no room is available, return -1. If the intersection is terminal, returns the
028     * static variable OneRoadIntersection of the class Event.
029     * @param car
030     * @param roadExiting
031     * @param roadEntering
032     * @return
033     */
034    public int canEnter(Vehicle car, Road roadExiting, Road roadEntering);
035    
036    /**
037     * Get Parking of Intersection (only if Intersection has a Parking)
038     * @return parking or null if it does not have a Parking
039     */
040    public Parking getParking();
041    
042    /**
043     * Returns an array of the roads that can be entered and exited in the current mode.
044     * @return
045     */
046    public Road[] roadsAllowed();
047    
048    /**
049     * Returns a array of the roads that will be available to enter or exit at time time
050     * @param time
051     * @return
052     */
053    public Road[] roadsAllowed(double time);
054    
055    /**
056     * Removes the Vehicle car from the intersection. The parameter roadExiting is
057     * the road from which the vehicle entered the intersection.
058     * @param car
059     * @param roadExiting
060     */
061    public void removeVehicle(Vehicle car, Road roadExiting);
062    
063    /**
064     * Checks whether the Vehicle object car will be able to move from roadExiting to
065     * roadEntering through the intersection at the specified time
066     * @param car
067     * @param roadExiting
068     * @param time
069     * @return
070     */
071    public boolean modeMatches(Vehicle car, Road roadExiting, Road roadEntering, double time);
072    
073    /**
074     * Checks whether the Vehicle object car will be able to move from roadExiting to
075     * roadEntering through the intersection with the current mode of the intersection
076     * @param car
077     * @param roadExiting
078     * @return
079     */
080    public boolean modeMatches(Vehicle car, Road roadExiting, Road roadEntering);
081    
082    /**
083     * Notifies all connecting roads that the mode of the intersection has been changed
084     * at the time specified.
085     * @param time
086     */
087    public void notifyAll(double time);
088    
089    /**
090     * Set Intersection as a Destination.
091     * @param ID ID of destination
092     * @param name name of destination
093     */
094    public void setAsDestination(int ID, String name);
095    
096    /**
097     * Get Latitude coordinates (in degrees) of Intersection.
098     * @return latitude coordinates in degrees
099     */
100    public double getLatitude();
101
102    /**
103     * Get Longitude coordinates (in degrees) of Intersection.
104     * @return longitude coordinates in degrees
105     */
106    public double getLongitude();
107    
108    /**
109     * Changes the mode of the intersection. The mode of the intersection specifies 
110     * which connecting roads can be entered or exited using the intersection.
111     * @return
112     */
113    public double changeMode();
114    
115    /**
116     * Get Destination name if Intersection is a Destination.
117     * @return destination name (if any)
118     */
119    public String getDestinationName();
120    
121    /**
122     * Get Destination ID if Intersection is a Destination.
123     * @return destination ID (if any)
124     */
125    public int getDestinationID();
126    
127    /**
128     * Increase count of Vehicles arrived (only if Intersection is a Destination)
129     */
130    public void vehicleArrived();
131    
132    /**
133     * Get number of Vehicles arrived (only if Intersection is a Destination)
134     * @return
135     */
136    public int getVehicleCount();
137    
138    /**
139     * Render Destination in graphical representation.
140     * @param w width of Canvas
141     * @param h height of Canvas
142     * @param minLat minimum Latitude coordinates of full system
143     * @param maxLat maximum Latitude coordinates of full system
144     * @param minLon minimum Longitude coordinates of full system
145     * @param maxLon maximum Longitude coordinates of full system
146     * @param zoom scale factor (modified when user zooms in/out)
147     * @param g2d Graphics2D instance of Canvas
148     */
149    public void render(int w, int h, double minLat, double maxLat, double minLon, double maxLon, double zoom, Graphics2D g2d);
150    
151    /**
152     * Set Intersection as a Parking Intersection.
153     * @param ID ID of the Parking the intersection holds
154     */
155    public void setAsParking(int ID);
156    
157    /**
158     * Creates all the possible modes of the intersection, which will be cycled through
159     * whenever changeMode().
160     */
161    public void setModes();
162    
163    /**
164     * If the intersection has a parking lot, calls notifyParking() to start emptying 
165     * the parking. If it does not, sets the intersection as idle.
166     */
167    public void setInitialMode();
168    
169    /**
170     * Check if Intersection is a Destination.
171     * @return true if Intersection is a Destination
172     */
173    public boolean isDestination();
174    
175    /**
176     * Sets the last active time (lastActive) of the intersection to be time and
177     * makes the intersection not idle.
178     * @param time
179     */
180    public void notIdle(double time);
181    
182    /**
183     * Checks whether the intersection is idle. The passed parameter time is used
184     * to see how long it has been since the intersection was last active.
185     * @param time
186     * @return
187     */
188    public boolean isIdle(double time);
189    
190    /**
191     * Returns whether the intersection is idle.
192     * @return 
193     */
194    public boolean isIdle();
195    
196
197    
198    /**
199     * Get position of Intersection in X and Y coordinates scaled to the full system dimensions.
200     * @param width width of Canvas
201     * @param height height of Canvas
202     * @param minLat minimum Latitude coordinates of full system
203     * @param maxLat maximum Latitude coordinates of full system
204     * @param minLon minimum Longitude coordinates of full system
205     * @param maxLon maximum Longitude coordinates of full system
206     * @return position array (x and y)
207     */
208    public double[] getPosition(int width, int height, double minLat, double maxLat, double minLon, double maxLon);
209    
210    /**
211     * Notify that Parking in Intersection is empty (only if Intersection has a Parking).
212     */
213    public void setParkingEmpty();
214}
